descriptions.content:
• འཛིན་བཟུང་ “Capture” (seize-hold)
  • མཇལ་ཕྲད་ “Encounter” (meet [H]-meet)
  • གསུང་བཤད་ “Speech,” “discourse” (say [H]-say)
  • འཕེལ་རྒྱས་ “Development” (increase-spread)
  • བཀག་འགོག་ “Obstruction” (stop [past]-stop [present])
  • འཛུག་སྐྲུན་ “Construction” (establish-construct)
